faqs.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes. Auto repayments can be canceled or edited at any time. To do, so go to your automatic repayments.

faqs.question: Are my funds automatically redeemed to lenders after they are repaid?
faqs.answer: Yes. By default, when you set up auto-repayments, your funds will be added to your account disbursed to the lenders within a couple days.

faqs.question: Will I be notified when an auto-repayment occurs?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll get a receipt from PayPal notifying you every time an auto-repayment is made.

faqs.question: Can I make auto repayments on a weekly, quarterly or annual basis?
faqs.answer: At this time we only offer auto repayments on a monthly basis. If you’re interested in being alerted as to when we launch other frequencies, please email contactus@kiva.org and let us know.
